## Private Member Attributes

### SSID {#a65f9ba8779a387481bb1e0780fbb1a23}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="SyncScope::ID llvm::StoreInst::SSID">
The synchronization scope <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> of this store instruction.

Not quite enough room in SubClassData for everything, so synchronization scope <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> gets its own field.
